# emlmm

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

R package for fitting penalised linear mixed-effect models via EM-type algorithms.

## Installation

You can install the development version of emlmm from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("AndreaCappozzo/emlmm")
```
